column4: I installed SuSE but then realized that it won't work for me so I removed it but now it kept the SuSE grub which is messed up and wont let me boot into my Windows partition anymore. How do I restore Ubuntu's grub?

I installed SuSE but then realized that it won't work for me so I removed it but now it kept the SuSE grub which is messed up and wont let me boot into my Windows partition anymore. How do I restore Ubuntu's grub?
just boot from the ubuntu CD, and reinstall grub
